Hi,

I am planning to do my MS thesis on Swarm Intelligence using NEAT. In
=
Ken's interview with Tom Barbalet of biota.org, he mentioned that NEAT
uses=
 competition to weed out the least performing individuals and
species, but =
they are essentially independent of each other.

Is it possible to have the=
 entities co-operate in some way to obtain
swarm intelligence? Also, I woul=
d like to expand on this using
heterogeneous agents (some sort of symbiosis=
 between agents).

Any suggestions/ thoughts?

Regards,
Mridul.

PS: I am w=
orking with Tom Barbalet on NobleApe (www.nobleape.com), and
I would like t=
o extend this to noblewarfare (www.noblewarfare.com) too.
